description:
Music player designed with Material You Features
  • Enjoy your favorite music in a variety of formats, including MP3, FLAC, OGG, WAV, and more
  • Easily browse tracks, albums, artists, and genres, and create custom playlists
  • Enhance your listening experience with synchronized lyrics from LRCLIB
  • Manually update track details or fetch accurate info from MusicBrainz
  • Designed with Material You and supports dynamic color palettes
